casebody.data:
STATE
v.
David Franklin HURT. No. 192A04-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 3, 2006. Lisa Bradley Dawson, Robert C. Montgomery, Assistant Attorney Generals, James C. Gaither, Jr., District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 29th day of September 2006 by Defendant to Strike Supplemental Brief for the State:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 3rd day of October 2006."
